name: Stave Off The Dark
description:
You are a small little slime trapped in a cave. You have nothing but your torch keeping you safe from the dark. As you try and find your way out, You begin to hear movement all around you. With your trusty safety torch you must fend off the creatures within the dark!

Enjoy this small little project I am working on. The high score feature may not be working as intended but in the future I will be updating the game fixing this issue and adding new features. This is considered an Alpha build and not a finished game. Be sure to comment saying if you enjoyed it and if there are any suggestions you may have to improve the game! Thank you for trying out my first game! Also, feel free to  post screenshots or just share your high score in the comments below!

Left click to shoot.

WASD to move.

R to pause and unpause.

Enter fullscreen mode within the pause menu.

The is a volume slider in the bottom right of the main menu and pause screen.
